derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Dutch bruin (see brown); used as a name for the bear in the 13th-cent. fable Reynard the Fox

means.word_mean: 1. a conventional name for a bear used in tales following usage in the old epic `Reynard the Fox'
